mapper.insert: /* 회사등록 */ INSERT INTO company_info ( ci_code ,company_number ,ci_name ,ci_delegate_num ,company_addr ,company_cate ,company_birth ,company_name ) VALUES (#{companyCode}, #{companyNum}, #{companyInfoName}, #{companyDelegateNum}, #{companyAddr}, #{companyCate}, #{companyBirth}, #{companyName});
mapper.select: /* 회사 목록 조회 */ SELECT ci_code ,company_number ,ci_name ,REPLACE(ci_delegate_num,SUBSTRING_INDEX(ci_delegate_num,'-',-1),'*******') AS ci_delegate_num ,company_addr ,company_cate ,company_birth ,company_name FROM company_info ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(ci_code,'_code',-1) AS UNSIGNED);
mapper.insert: /* 사업장 등록 */ INSERT INTO work_place ( wp_code ,wp_company_number ,wp_company_name ,wp_name ,wp_delegate_num ,wp_addr ,wp_cate ,wp_birth ) VALUES (#{workPlaceCode}, #{wpCompanyNumber}, #{workPlaceName}, #{workPlaceRepresentative}, #{workPlaceDelegateNum}, #{workPlaceAddr}, #{workPlaceCate}, #{workPlaceBirth});
mapper.select: /* 사업장 목록 조회 */ SELECT wp_code ,wp_company_number ,wp_company_name ,wp_name ,wp_delegate_num ,wp_addr ,wp_cate ,wp_birth FROM work_place ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(wp_code,'_code',-1) AS UNSIGNED);
/* 부서 목록 조회 */ SELECT w.wp_company_name ,d.de_code ,d.de_name ,d.de_date FROM department AS d INNER JOIN work_place AS w ON d.wp_code = w.wp_code ORDER BY w.wp_company_name ASC;
mapper.insert: /* 사원 등록 */ INSERT INTO employee_info ( e_code ,e_level_code ,de_code ,e_name ,e_pw ,e_date ) VALUES (#{employeeCode}, #{employeeLevelCode}, #{departmentCode}, #{employeeName}, #{employeePw}, CURDATE());
mapper.select: /* 사원 목록 조회 */ SELECT e.e_code ,e.e_level_code ,e.de_code ,e.e_name ,e.e_pw ,e.e_date ,e.resign_date ,m.e_level FROM employee_info AS e INNER JOIN management_level AS m ON e.e_level_code = m.e_level_code ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(e_code,'_code',-1) AS UNSIGNED);
